nodes.text: R2-H7 was a green and white astromech droid who traveled to Coruscant in 22 BBY with the convoy protecting Senator Padmé Amidala. When the convoy landed on Coruscant it fell prey to an attack planned by Zam Wesell. R2-H7 was one of the victims of the attack as the droid was impacted in one of the N-1 starfighters.
